          "notes": "Successfully created DateUtils.swift with all required functionality:\n- Sleep boundary logic: getLogicalDate(for:) implements 02:00 boundary rule (00:00-01:59 belongs to previous day)\n- shouldShowSleepPopup() checks if current time is >= 02:00\n- getSleepDate(for:) alias for clearer sleep context\n- Korean locale formatting: formatKorean(_:style:), formatKoreanWithTime(_:dateStyle:timeStyle:)\n- Relative date strings: relativeDate(_:) returns \uc624\ub298/\uc5b4\uc81c/\ub0b4\uc77c or formatted date\n- Duration formatting: formatDuration(minutes:) converts to hours/minutes in Korean\n- Date creation: date(year:month:day:) helper\n- Date calculations: daysBetween(from:to:)\nAll methods include comprehensive Korean/English documentation with examples.
